name: EffectiveAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, open Effective Affirmations”
”Alexa, start Effective Affirmations”
”Alexa, launch Effective Affirmations”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: effective affirmations
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Many times, affirmations don't work because the rational mind rejects what's being said. 

Effective Affirmations are designed to be acceptable to your rational mind, thus allowing your creative mind to send them straight to the Universe as an order. 

To use: Just repeat the affirmation given to you at the start of the day, and at the end of the day, assess how it came into play in your life.

Simple, uplifting and positive. 

You can say:

"Alexa, open Effective Affirmations"
"Alexa, start Effective Affirmations"
"Alexa, launch Effective Affirmations"

Please leave a review if you love this skill, or send us an email with your suggestions at alice@alicelangholt.com. Your reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills, and thank you! This is my 17th skill and I hope you like it! Love, Alice
